execution_quality: Efficient and accurate execution with 6 edits completed across 2 files in 43 seconds with zero errors. The agent methodically addressed each of the 6 validation points from the teammate's checklist.
work_category: Validation and correction of technical specification document against a detailed checklist. The agent read sections of an org-mode file, verified claims against source material, and made targeted edits to fix inaccuracies.
summary: The agent executed a straightforward validation task with high precision, confirming technical accuracy across all 6 checklist items and making necessary corrections to the specification document. The clean completion with zero errors and immediate follow-up idle notifications from validators suggests successful task fulfillment and team coordination. This represents well-aligned, efficient collaborative work within a larger validation pipeline.
follow_up_pattern: Session ended after validation confirmation. Teammate validators went idle after reporting completion, indicating handoff/milestone achievement rather than active problem state.
